name: HKCategoryValueAppleWalkingSteadinessEvent
desc: The value of an event triggered by a reduced score for the steadiness of the user’s gait.

items.name: case initialLow
items.desc: The user received a below-normal steadiness score for their gait while walking.

items.name: case initialVeryLow
items.desc: The user received a steadiness score for their gait while walking that was considerably below normal.

items.name: case repeatLow
items.desc: The user’s below-normal score persists over a significant period of time.

items.name: case repeatVeryLow
items.desc: The user’s considerably below-normal score persists over a significant period of time.
